name: [ALPHA] Sqrl: The Desktop Squirrel
description:
[Sqrl is currently in its ALPHA stage, stay tuned for updates]

Feeling lonely? 

Ever wished for a little virtual companion or pet to be at your side while you work on your digital tasks?

Well look no further! Sqrl is cute little desktop squirrel who will hang out on your taskbar while you go on with your daily antics.

To get Sqrl on you desktop:

  • Install the respective files according to your OS
  • Unzip the files
  • And run sqrl.exe
  • Soon enough, a cute squirrel will appear!
  • If you want to get rid of Sqrl, then simple right click on the rodent and then click Exit.

As of now, Sqrl doesn't do much except for sitting and running around on the taskbar, but in future updates, more interactive features will be added, so stay tuned!
